terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators
Class ActuatorPlugin

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators.ActuatorPlugin
Direct Known Subclasses:
TransformGroupPlugin
public abstract class ActuatorPlugin
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract base class for actuator personality plugins. Also defines the format of the input actuation value. Includes basic vector processing of the actuation value including scale, offset, and clamping (in that order).

The target node controlled by this plugin should only be manipulated through this plugin. Setting the target node's state directly will invalidate the state of this plugin and its actuator.

toActuationSource

protected javax.vecmath.Tuple4d toActuationSource(javax.vecmath.Tuple4d value,
                                                  javax.vecmath.Tuple4d copy)
Performs the source-side vector processing, which includes scale and offset (in that order). Should be used by subclasses to process all input event values.

Parameters:
value - Actuation value.
copy - Container for the copied return value.

toActuationTarget

protected javax.vecmath.Tuple4d toActuationTarget(javax.vecmath.Tuple4d value,
                                                  javax.vecmath.Tuple4d copy)
Performs the target-side vector processing, which includes clamping. Should be used by subclasses to process all output target state values. Note that clamping can not be applied in plugins where the state is not be maintained as a vector value.

Parameters:
value - Actuation value.
copy - Container for the copied return value.
Returns:
Reference to .
